name: Chicken Biryani
description: A flavorful dish made with tender chicken pieces cooked with aromatic spices and basmati rice.

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: A vegetarian delight featuring a mix of fresh vegetables cooked with fragrant spices and long-grain basmati rice.

name: Mutton Biryani
description: A classic dish made with tender mutton pieces marinated in spices and layered with aromatic basmati rice.

name: Margherita Pizza
description: A traditional Italian pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A classic favorite featuring spicy pepperoni slices, tomato sauce, and melted cheese on a crispy crust.

name: Vegetarian Pizza
description: A delicious vegetarian option with a medley of fresh vegetables, tomato sauce, and cheese on a thin crust.

name: Classic Burger
description: An all-time favorite featuring a juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, and classic condiments on a sesame seed bun.

name: Cheeseburger
description: A cheese lover's delight with a succulent beef patty topped with melted cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion, and pickles on a toasted bun.

name: Chicken Burger
description: A flavorful alternative featuring a grilled chicken breast, lettuce, tomato, onion, and special sauce on a whole grain bun.
